entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chibougamau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -35.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chibougamau Chapais Airport 06:38 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

Temperature: -35.0°C

Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
